name: Predictable Tears
description:
Daisy often finds her roommate crying.

Game length: 10 mins

Credits:
BG: from Potat0Master background pack
Programming, sprite art and story: mirusenna

Note: This is a dabble at making a visual novel using the plot of the story I wrote a couple of years ago.  Thank you for playing if you do decide to play the visual novel I made.
